snippet: The order, in a dispute over possession of the Schneerson Library, seems likely to extend Russia’s ban since 2011 on lending its art to American museums.
abstract: Federal District Court Judge Royce C Lamberth orders Russia to pay $43.7 million in fines accrued since 2013, when country was ordered to return collection of Jewish books and documents to Chabad-Lubavitch Hasidic group, which is now based in Brooklyn, NY.
lead_paragraph: The order, in a dispute over possession of the Schneerson Library, seems likely to extend Russia’s ban since 2011 on lending its art to American museums.

headline.main: Russia Fined $44 Million for Refusing to Hand Over Jewish Books
headline.print_headline: Russia Fined $44 Million for Refusing to Hand Over Jewish Books
